item.description:
A Self-Introduction
#

Hi, please just call me Ziqian (which means “son with humility”). I am a PhD student at the Education University of Hong Kong (2025 - present), supervised by Dr. Phil Duo Liu.

Before that, I worked as a full-time research assistant for three years in Beijing and Hong Kong (2022-2025). I received my Master’s degree (Psychological Foundation) from South China Normal University in 2022 and my Bachelor’s degree (Psychology) from Jiangxi Normal University in 2019.
